title: Shawn Stigler and Alex Nelson Alpine Endeavors Law Scholarship Fund
description: The scholarship will be awarded to a third year student who in his or her first two years of law school has demonstrated a passion for the alpine sports (skiing, snowboarding, telemarking, etc.)
marketingContent: The scholarship will be awarded to a third year student who in his or her first two years of law school has demonstrated a passion for the alpine sports (skiing, snowboarding, telemarking, etc.)
